name: After School Program
description: ExCEL program at no cost from 2:55pm to 6:00 p.m. The ExCEL after-school program is for TK-5th grade students. It is an academic, recreation and enrichment program for MEC students that provides academics, homework support, art, dance, nutrition, cooking, gardening, and performing arts.
